text: mad‌yankarilekk avarute saheadaranaya su'aibineyum (ayaccu.) addeham parannu: enre janannale, ninnal allahuve aradhikkuka. ninnalkk avanallate yatearu daivavumilla. ninnalkk ninnalute raksitavinkal ninn vyaktamaya teliv vannittunt‌. atinal ninnal alavum tukkavum tikaccukeatukkanam. janannalkku'avarute sadhanannalil ninnal kam'mivaruttarut‌. bhumiyil nanmavaruttiyatin sesam ninnal avite nasamuntakkarut‌. ninnal visvasikalanenkil atan ninnalkk uttamam
